Satan exults because he knows that if he can set brother to watch brother in the church and in the ministry, some will be so disheartened and discouraged as to leave their post of duty. This is not the work of the Holy Spirit; a power from beneath is working in the 


                                                  637 

chambers of the mind and in the soul temple to place his attributes where the attributes of Christ should be.-- GCB, Feb 25, 1895, p 338.
